ASSISTANCE.ALERT_MESSAGE: An assigned room is needed in order to request assistance.
ASSISTANCE.THERE_ARE_NO_REQUESTS_AVAILABLE_AT_THIS_: There are no requests available at this time
ASSISTANCE.WHAT_CAN_WE_HELP_YOU_WITH: What can we help you with

ERRORS.EXPIRED_QR_MESSAGE: Your stay is expired and we hope you enjoyed your experience in our hotel. We very much looking forward to have you back as our guest. If you need additional information we will be happy to welcome you at the reception. From now on you will be redirected to the scan QR screen.
ERRORS.THE_PHONE_NUMBER_INTRODUCED_DO_NOT_MATCH: The phone number introduced do not match the phone number of the check-in
ERRORS.WRONG_QR_SUBTITLE: The QR code has not a valid format
ERRORS.WRONG_QR_SUBTITLE_TRY_AGAIN: There is an error with the QR code. Please try again
ERRORS.SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: Please enable the screen lock on your device. This app cannot operate securely without it.

EULA.DISAGREE_EULA: You must agree if you want to continue using Hotel.Me

SCANNER.ENTER_YOUR_PHONE_NUMBER_WITH_THE_FORMAT: Enter your phone number with the format
SCANNER.PLACE_A_BARCODE_INSIDE_THE_SCAN_AREA: Place a barcode inside the scan area

VALIDATIONS.PHONE_NUMBER_MUST_HAVE_INT_CODE_AND_9_NU: Phone number must have +[International code] and 9 numbers at least
